EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Child Community Edit Form
EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Used for editing the Community Information for a Child Project Extension
EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

c:FormField.Caption: Name of province, state or region
Name of major city or name of nearest city
Distance in relation to major city above
Percentage of local population that is Protestant
Name of Christian agencies/organizations providing relief, development, or programmatic interventions for children
Time to get to the nearest medical facility
